title: Crusty olive or sunflower seed rolls
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons dried yeast with ¾ teaspoon caster sugar, or 1 sachet easy-blend yeast', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) wholemeal flour, plus extra for dusting', '250 g (9 oz) strong plain white flour', '2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon sunflower oil', '50 g (1¾ oz) green olives, stoned, patted dry and chopped', '20 g (¾ oz) sunflower seeds']
